title: Can't see Yasuo dash and Gangplank Barrel timers.
body: I don't know if it's a bug or I haven't got the right graphic option, but I can't see Yasuo's dash and Gangplanks barrel circle timers. It's less of a problem with gangplank but with Yasuo I have no idea when I can dash on an enemy after i've already dashed on them. which option in the menu lets me see these?

replies.body:
It sounds like you're experiencing this due to some missing assets in the game. I strongly recommend trying a [repair of the game files](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq5) to see if it resolves this.

Let me know if this helped. ^.^

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=jJevdJbF,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-26T02:00:21.772+0000)
>
> It sounds like you're experiencing this due to some missing assets in the game. I strongly recommend trying a [repair of the game files](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq5) to see if it resolves this.
> 
> Let me know if this helped. ^.^

After repairing the game files, playing a 2 full normal games, I'm still having problems. Yasuo at least displays a small grey dot indicator (no circle around them), while gangplank's barrels show me nothing. I increased the graphics quality and still no indicators. 

http://imgur.com/a/m5kdm

Hmm.. This may be a combination of a few different causes. I'd like you to reach out to our tech team in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can investigate this further. Be sure to attach some [hextech logs](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) with your ticket so we'll have more context regarding this issue.

Let me know if you run into any issues along the way.
